name: Idlemancy
description:
A Lich gets bored and decides to invade another dimension.  Naturally, this dimension uses a magical crystal to keep you from bringing RUIN....so you know, you should probably take care of that...with clicking.  Lots of clicking.

Made for Clicker Jam Winter 2023 Hosted by Xeight!

https://itch.io/jam/clicker-jam-winter-2023

#ClickerJam
